test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-idivide-001
test-case.description: test possible overflow of xs:decimal
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:decimal) as xs:decimal { $arg * $arg }; local:square(4294967296.0) idiv 0.0000000000005 gt 0

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-idivide-002
test-case.description: test possible overflow of xs:double
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:double) as xs:double { $arg * $arg }; local:square(1e100) idiv 5e-100

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-idivide-003
test-case.description: test possible overflow of xs:float
test-case.test: declare function local:square($arg as xs:float) as xs:float { $arg * $arg }; local:square(xs:float(1e30)) idiv xs:float(5e-30)

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-idivide-004
test-case.description: ensure that idividing xs:integers returns an xs:integer
test-case.test: declare function local:integer($x as xs:decimal) { if ($x mod 1 eq 0) then xs:integer($x) else $x }; (local:integer(2) idiv local:integer(2)) instance of xs:integer

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-idivide-005
test-case.description: Test idiv by one on an xs:integer

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-idivide-006
test-case.description: Test idiv by one on an xs:float

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-idivide-007
test-case.description: Test idiv by one on an xs:double

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-idivide-008
test-case.description: Test idiv by one on an xs:double

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-idivide-009
test-case.description: Test numeric idiv with a potential type check error
test-case.test: declare function local:value($number as xs:boolean) { if ($number) then 1 else xs:string('1') }; local:value(true()) idiv local:value(true())
